project_descr: Transport for the Disabled: Support of the development of accessible transport in Penang

outputs.output_descr:
Project seeks to: 
1.  Increase accessibility of the public transport system in Penang and develop a strategy towards full accessibility 
2. Provide accessible transport to those who are excluded from using public transportation because of a very severe disability; accessible transport in the immediate short-term while accessibility improvements to public transport are being implemented; and extend the accessible transport chain to the PWDs front door, where needed
3. increase the number of PWDs using the public transport system in Penang as accessibility improvements are introduced
